name: graphemica: change fonts on hover
description: Change fonts of character depending on mouse position at http://graphemica.com/
additional_info:
(Currently just Windows (10?) system font stack.)

- Hover page to see characters in "Segoe UI (Symbol)".
- Click body to see characters in "Arial (Unicode MS)".
- Hover character to see it in "Segoe UI Emoji".
- Font stack in effect is displayed under detail character.
- Screenshots taken at http://graphemica.com/%F0%9F%94%AE
